title: Asylum Records logo - Can anybody help?
author: Gavlar

comments.content:
I've looked at this so many times over the years and the first impression I always get is - Hobo - but I know that is not correct. This goes way back to 1971 and so it is pre-digital. I've flicked through all my old Letraset references, and nada, zip, zilch zero - nothing leaps out.

If you're really stuck, you could always ask the record company. I know it's no longer owned by David Geffen, or Elektra, but it was relaunched about 10 years ago by Warner Bros.  
You could send a tweet.  
 [https://twitter.com/AsylumRecs](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829103026/https:/twitter.com/AsylumRecs "https://twitter.com/AsylumRecs")

I should know this and I'll kick myself when I find out what it is.
